channel.title: Runescape Hunger Games - "May the odds be ever in your favor!"
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lXVG11Q.png[/img] [URL=http://hg-rs.net/home/client.jar]Play now![/URL] | [URL=http://www.HG-RS.net]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://hg-rs.net/forums/]Forums[/URL][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2]
Have you grown tired of most private servers, are you bored of doing the EXACT same thing on each and every one? Well, that's where we promise to be different at. Our server is entirely a [U]mini-game[/U] based server, no leveling, and no grinding for hours on end to achieve goals that you might just end up losing anyways!
Sound good? Well continue reading! Our gameplay concept is based off the [b]Hunger Games[/b], similar to the [b]Minecraft[/b] servers, but unique and fun in its own way! - [SIZE=1][I]If you don't know what the Hunger Games are, then you should definitely go watch the movie or read the book, you'll love them![/I][/SIZE]
SO, do you think you can fight off 15 or more players in a timed death match? Oh not to mention, the only items you can acquire are the ones that you find around the map, or from the players you've killed. AND did I mention the terrifying monsters roaming around? Think you have what it takes? Only the best can win!
You can unlock or buy [I]special kits[/I] to help your chances of winning, unlock [I]new perks[/I] that increase passive abilities, and fight your way to the top! If you think you have what it takes, then please join, and be prepared to fight for your life![/SIZE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9uZRfJ6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7AZQ4Pm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bmxQKiL.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONQ7ijxGV64[/youtube][/center]
[SIZE=3][B]*Kits descriptions*[/B][/SIZE]
There is currently over 20 kits available for you to decide! Excluding the perks to boost your playing.
[ul][*][B]Default:[/B] Has a slight chance for a little more food from chest drops [*][B]Berserk:[/B] Has a slight chance to increase your max hit damage, start with a zerker necklace and a super strength pot [*][B]Archer:[/B] Have the ability at random to shoot quicker with an MSB, also have a higher chance to get arrows or any ammo from chests. Start with ranger boots and an MSB. [*][B]Elementalist:[/B] You don't need any elemental runes (Airs, fires, etc) while casting spells. Also you have a higher chance of getting runes from chests. Start with Ancient staff and wizard boots. [*][B]Protected:[/B] All multi-areas are single now just for you, so you wont get piled by teams. -10% str/mage/range. [*][B]Alchemist:[/B] Start with a mixture of herbs and vials to make potions.(Note there is no other way to get most pots unless you're alchemist). Also have a high chance to drop herbs and vials from chests. [*][B]Sickness:[/B] Chance to rotten opponent's food and get them out of food quicker. [*][B]Saint[/B] Your prayer wont drain during the game and random chanche of gaining hp. [*][B]Forsaken:[/B] Spawn in a random spot outside of the circle during the beginning of the match. [*][B]Perished:[/B] When you die you'll respawn on the same spot with your items and 60 hp. You can only do this once per game. [*][B]Venom:[/B] Has a chance to poison anyone you hit with any weapon. Your poison will do 10 damage. You can't poison other venoms. [*][B]Blizzard:[/B] You have a chance to freeze the person you're fighting with a damage-less ice barrage (10% with range, and 20% with melee). You start with ice gloves and must wear these to get the effect. [*][B]Flash:[/B] You have the ability to teleport anywhere you click, whether it's on the minimap or the main game screen. You start with boots of lightness and must be wearing these for the effect. You'll have a 20 sec cooldown. [*][B]Looter:[/B] Increase your chances for rare items by 50%. You start with a rogues mask and must wear this for the effect. [*][B]Jumper:[/B] Start with a portal item that lets you place a portal down anywhere you want. Later you can teleport back to the portal. The cooldown is 100 seconds. [*][B]Skiller:[/B] Start with two saradomin brews, some unfinished rune arrows, and a prayer potion. You can fix barrows within your inventory with a 100% success rate, and you can steal already cooked fish from stalls.(Normally raw) [*][B]Chaos:[/B] Wake the fear in enemies hearts! Unequip their gear, make rapid hits and force them to walk! [*][B]Tainted:[/B] Special attack will increase your hitpoints and prayer points. Chance to hit through defence! Perfect for domination! [*][B]Necromorpher:[/B]For 25 seconds you will turn to mighty undead skeleton, with unlimited runes for every spell! +10 mage damage for every spell [*][B]Knight:[/B] Will gain +10% passive defence, and excalibur special 100% stronger. -10% Str/Range/mage [*][B]Wretched:[/B] You can turn to any one of the barrows brothers 6 times during one game.[/ul]
[SIZE=3][B]*More pictures*[B][/SIZE] [CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gTbCUWv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/9cd543b06f246cc8972e7d1e05cfda1c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/n8lt3Oj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9BN7uhg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PzVszBW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zDaWoQv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7zb0aVA.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0QD57fb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y2f3fvm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/t5RCrLs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/USgZ1E3.png[/img]
100% custom home to suit everyone's needs!
[img]http://gyazo.com/3a596da531f4d787419f124982b4013d.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v5OTLRk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BAyfM9a.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VoFerxO.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hbsQkOE.png[/img]
Like what you see? Well join us today! [URL=http://hg-rs.net/home/client.jar]Click to play![/URL]
[/CENTER]
